talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? That's not it! Anyway, what the heck is going on here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How could I not see it? A massive new road sprang up out of nowhere!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it? At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
His Majesty and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are. The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why has this happened in Saint Haven specifically?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Think of the underlying principles of this world, fool. Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

$Velskud$
… You still don't know what's inSaint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it. You consider this place to be safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
It's obvious! Don't we need the Cup of Healing to wake up the Goddess? Hold on… But if the Goddess wakes up, does what Feder said before come true? Our entire world will disappear! What the heck do we do?

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Geraint$
How… strange. I never would have expected a child of hybrids to come here.

$Geraint$
… Come to think of it, you are a child of hybrids, and yet not at the same time. Fragment of Chaos, I never expected to meet you in a place like this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We know each other. Don't you remember me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I don't know that name. But you sound like we know each other.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Both his eyes are intact. Perhaps… This is Geraint from the past.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
... No, I do not know you. My mission dictates that I kill you. I believe that you, as a Dragon, must also understand this mission. Do you have anything to say?

${user_nick}$
No, it's good to see you alive. That's all I have to say. I think you're a past version of Geraint, but... At least you're alive.
(Your vision of Geraint is becoming blurry. Is it raining?)

$Geraint$
... Your words are hard to understand, but if I encountered a Chaos Fragment in the future and let it live... and for a Fragment to have said what you just did, there must have been a good reason.

$Geraint$
Yet you have a jewel of Chaos within you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I entered the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and somehow ended up here.</html>
<html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(</FONT><FONT color=#2b2723>… </FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>A dream within a dream?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
This place is a dream within a dream of the Goddess. But how did you come to possess a jewel of the Red Dragon?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That's right, the only Silver Dragon Geraint knows of is Argenta.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Silver Dragon's Forcefield…? I hadn't heard that Argenta built a nest…

$Geraint$
You do not appear to be lying. If you were able to enter the Silver Dragon's Forcefield, she must have allowed it. I'm sorry. I almost killed you without hearing about your childhood.

${user_nick}$
(So, Geraint was right. This must be what he was trying to tell me...)
I, it's okay. But… A dream within a dream?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If this place is a shadow of the past, does that include you too, Geraint?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Sure. A dream within a dream of the Goddess, the deepest part of her dream. As Argenta said, it could be called a shadow of the past.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Wait, if this Geraint is not a shadow of the past… perhaps...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It sounds like from your point of view that is so. But it is a difficult question for me to readily answer from my perspective.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Geraint, I have something to tell you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Why the long face, hybrid bearer of the jewel?

$Geraint$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
Time and space have been distorted. What a shame. I tried to extract you.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course I would run into one of the least reliable people here…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_06.ogg}{action:Talk}
{user_nick}! It's nice to see you here! It looks like we're in Old Saint Haven, but I don't know how to get out of here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Old Saint Haven… Was Saint Haven really like this back in the day?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_07.ogg}
That's a bit harsh! Geez… Still, I don't have a good comeback for you this time. I have absolutely no clue what to do. What about Eltia? Is she well?

$Lancea Charlotte$
It was! This is what it looked like before the Dragon Followers invaded. It looks completely different now. You know, I was trying to figure out why Saint Haven was changing, and then somehow ended up here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Comelina</FONT> over there was also aware that the palace had changed…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_08.ogg}
Oh! So you saw it too! It seems we're the only ones who recognized what was happening. Nobody in the palace knew except His Majesty! I'm so happy to meet someone else in the know!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't think there's anything the king could do even if he was here.</html>
<html>We have to think of a way out.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_09.ogg}
Yes! That's what she said. The changes in the palace... King Cassius was right! But His Majesty is not here. What do we do?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(After finishing the conversation, Lancea just stares the door. You should go speak with someone else for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte$
A way out... I better give it some thought! Maybe we can break down this door?! I'll have to think about that!

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Lancea Charlotte$
A way out... I better give it some thought! Maybe we can break down this door?! I'll have to think about that!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I was swept up in a whirlwind inside the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT>. What about you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina${action:Talk}
So, you're here too, {user_nick}. Goddess above… I have no idea what happened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Indeed. Nobody I talked to remembered how Saint Haven had changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina${sound:npc_aca_q3856_06.ogg}
Right. I spoke with the king. No one was aware of the changes happening in Saint Haven. How about you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Goddess's dream… Apparently this place is a <FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina${sound:npc_aca_q3856_07.ogg}
There's no record of this phenomenon, but maybe... The data may have changed depending on the Goddess's dream.

$Academic Comelina${sound:npc_aca_q3856_05.ogg}
A dream within a dream? Is that so…? If reality changes in response to fluctuations in the dream... What is the meaning of everything that we've done?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But wouldn't that require the dream itself disappearing...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina${sound:npc_aca_q3856_09.ogg}
I thought everything would finally be done according to our own will, without dreams or prophets...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then we'll just keep trying. We can't simply give up…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
That's true. That's true. I'm not asking for the dream itself to disappear, just... for the dream to flow by our own power. As it stands, if the Goddess moves, everything changes.

$Academic Comelina${sound:npc_aca_q3856_08.ogg}
Right, we mustn't give up. There must be a reason why the Goddess brought us here. And I think if we work together, we can find a way out. Though I don't know how... Anyway, thanks, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
(As she said, we're the only ones here. There's plenty of reason to think negatively, and Geraint said he felt bad for us, but... Why don't I feel more frightened?)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Academic Comelina$
A way out... I'll have to give it some thought.

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look, we didn't come here because we wanted to!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time...
(His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.)
Quickly, grab my hand.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield - Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Geraint.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see him right in front of you. Talk to Geraint.

Cristal Stream-Geraint

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Lancea Charlotte.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Geraint. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Lancea Charlotte

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Academic Comelina.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Geraint. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Academic Comelina

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Geraint, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
